程序包 view

类 DashboardView

Object
DashboardView
所有已实现的接口:
ISubscriber, IView
直接已知子类:
AdministratorView, DoctorView, PatientView, PharmacistView
public abstract class DashboardView extends Object implements IView, ISubscriber
The DashboardView class provides common methods for dashboard views, including getting validated user choices, displaying notifications, tips, success and error messages, and a form for changing user password.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getChoice

      public int getChoice(int min, int max)
      Prompts the user to enter a choice within a specified range and returns the validated choice. Repeatedly prompts the user until a valid choice is entered.
      参数:
      min - The minimum valid choice (inclusive).
      max - The maximum valid choice (inclusive).
      返回:
      The user's validated choice as an integer.

    • showNotifications

      public void showNotifications(List<String> notifications)
      Displays a list of notifications.
      参数:
      notifications - A list of notification messages to be displayed

    • showUserTips

      public void showUserTips(List<String> tips)
      Displays a list of tips.
      参数:
      tips - A list of strings containing the tips to be displayed.

    • showSuccess

      public void showSuccess(String message)
      Displays a success message upon a successful action.
      参数:
      message - The success message to be displayed.

    • showSuccess

      public void showSuccess()
      Displays a success empty message upon a successful action.

    • showError

      public void showError(String message)
      Displays an error message upon an unsuccessful action.
      参数:
      message - The error message to be displayed.

    • showChangePasswordForm

      public void showChangePasswordForm(User user)
      Displays a form to change the user's password.
      参数:
      user - The user whose password is to be changed.
